ProductInfo.Features:
Single Channel Active Video Receiver. Long Distance (Up to 9000ft) Transmission of PAL /NTSC Real-time Video.
DSA. Transmission of Single Channel Data. Exceptional Interference Rejection.
Options for Distances: Three Levels. Red Light for Power, Green Light for Video.
Built -in Surge Protection, Lighting Protection and other Protection Settings.
Convenient Wiring, Higher Cable Utilization Rate and Lower Composite Wiring Cost.
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Single Channel DSA Active Video Receiver, Single Channel Data Transmission, PAL /NTSC for Security Surveillance CCTV Cameras and DVRs
